metadata.synopsis: A player moved an item, and the NPC is going to pick it up (they won't put it back in its original place, it will stay in their inventory).

0.speaker: GROUP_Civilians, GROUP_Constructs, GROUP_Demons, GROUP_Dragons, GROUP_Dwarves, GROUP_Elves, GROUP_Goblins, GROUP_Guards, GROUP_Humans, GROUP_Lizards, 77595417-3b1f-48b7-9737-993b5da48c81, GROUP_Ooze, GROUP_Origins, cc637ebd-04cb-4b5e-9728-1526e32e07f0, GROUP_Sentinel, GROUP_SmartUndead, GROUP_Trolls, GROUP_Undead, GROUP_Voidwoken
0.text: Won't let you out of my sight.
